name: RunMATLABTests
description: Run MATLAB and Simulink tests and generate artifacts.
author: The MathWorks, Inc.

inputs.name: sourceFolder
inputs.label: Source folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of the folder containing source code, relative to the project root folder. The specified folder and its subfolders are added to the top of the MATLAB search path. To generate a code coverage report, MATLAB uses only the source code in the specified folder and its subfolders.

inputs.name: selectByFolder
inputs.label: By folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of the folders used to select test suite elements, relative to the project root folder. To create a test suite, MATLAB uses only the tests in the specified folder and its subfolders.

inputs.name: selectByTag
inputs.label: By tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test tag used to select test suite elements. To create a test suite, the task uses only the test elements with the specified tag.

inputs.name: strict
inputs.label: Strict
inputs.helpMarkDown: Option to apply strict checks when running the tests.

inputs.name: useParallel
inputs.label: Use Parallel
inputs.helpMarkDown: Option to run tests in parallel (requires Parallel Computing Toolbox).

inputs.name: outputDetail
inputs.label: Output Detail
inputs.helpMarkDown: Display level for event details produced by the test run.

inputs.name: loggingLevel
inputs.label: Logging Level
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum verbosity level for logged diagnostics included for the test run.

inputs.name: testResultsPDF
inputs.label: PDF test report
inputs.helpMarkDown: File path to write the test results in PDF format (requires MATLAB R2020b or later on macOS platforms).

inputs.name: testResultsHTML
inputs.label: HTML test report
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder path to write the test results in HTML format.

inputs.name: testResultsJUnit
inputs.label: JUnit-style test results
inputs.helpMarkDown: File path to write the test results in JUnit-style XML format.

inputs.name: testResultsSimulinkTest
inputs.label: Simulink test results
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to export Simulink Test Manager results in MLDATX format (requires Simulink Test and is supported in MATLAB R2019a or later).

inputs.name: codeCoverageCobertura
inputs.label: Cobertura code coverage
inputs.helpMarkDown: File path to write the code coverage results in Cobertura XML format.

inputs.name: codeCoverageHTML
inputs.label: HTML code coverage
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder path to write the code coverage results in HTML format.

inputs.name: modelCoverageCobertura
inputs.label: Cobertura model coverage
inputs.helpMarkDown: File path to write the model coverage report in Cobertura XML format (requires Simulink Coverage and is supported in MATLAB R2018b or later).

inputs.name: modelCoverageHTML
inputs.label: HTML model coverage
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder path to write the model coverage results in HTML format (requires Simulink Coverage and is supported in MATLAB R2018b or later).

messages.FailedToRunTests: Tests failed with nonzero exit code.
